resources.string: Repair Battery Life needs a data connection to operate. Please enable Wifi or 3G and try again.

We have worked really hard to bring this free software to you. 

We would be really happy if you could rate us 5 stars and add a nice comment at google play. 

Would you like to do it now?
Displays ads while in use, including banners, pop-ups, and other graphics. The ads are common in free apps.
Installing apps from unknown sources can lead to malware. Go to Settings>Security and then disable Unknown Sources.
This app collects and sends SIM card details, including address book, mobile PIN, and call history. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
This app can initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.

This app can see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
This application can send SMS. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
This application can record audio and is a risk for your privacy.
This application can access the camera device and is a risk for your privacy.
This application can write SMS. This can add charges to data plan and is a MEDIUM privacy risk.
This application can access its exact position and is a risk for your privacy.
This application can read your private SMS and is a risk for your privacy.
This application can read your history bookmarks and is a risk for your privacy.
This application can write your history bookmarks and is a risk for your privacy.
Please select at least one application to uninstall.
You want to trust this application?
Do you want to remove from the list
Do not exist applications in ignore list
Run first analysis to check threats
